channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Nine killed in fire at Massachusetts assisted living facility
item.description: Flames roared through an assisted-living facility in Massachusetts, killing nine people and trapping residents inside, including some who were hanging out of windows screaming for help.

item.title: Search for Texas flood victims to resume after pause due to heavy rains
Boys & Girls Club programs threatened by Trump grant freeze serve thousands of families
